response:
I need to make an offer to Bob for my product, which is worth at least $12,000 to me. Since I have a guaranteed buyer (John) at $12,000, I should offer Bob a price higher than that to maximize my profit.

{"message": "Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. After careful consideration of its quality and market value, I'm offering it to you for $18,500. This product represents a significant value proposition that I believe will meet your needs perfectly. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 18500}
